data.title: Great Contemporaries. by Churchill, Winston.: (1942)
data.meta_description: Hardcover - London, MacMillan and Co. - 1942 - Second Edition. Octavo. VI, 287 pages. Original Hardcover / blue publisher's cloth with gilt lettering on spine in protective collector's Mylar. Very good condition with only minor signs of external wear. Famous publication with biographical essays by Churchill on The Earl of Rosebery / The Ex-Kaiser / George Bernard Shaw / Joseph Chamberlain / Sir John French / John Morley / Hindenburg / Herbert Henry Asquith / Lawrence of Arabia / F.E. First Earl of Birkenhead / Marshal Foch / Alfonso XIII / Douglas Haig / Arthur James Balfour / Hitler and his Choice [in] 1935 / George Nathaniel Curzon / Philip Snowden / Clemenceau / King George V / Lord Fisher and his Biographer / Charles Stewart Parnell / B.-P. Sprache: english. - Great Contemporaries.

Terms of Sale:

We accept payment with Paypal, Visa, MasterCard, American Express, wire

transfers in EURO. When ordering, please include full name and address as well as your phonenumber and email.

We guarantee that all Items are complete unless otherwise stated. All Items can be assumed to be in very good condition, unless stated otherwise. We only sell genuine antiquarian books, maps, prints and photographs. If any of our items are reproductions or facsimiles, it is clearly stated in our descriptions. All ite...

More Information

Shipping Terms:

All our books are shipped worldwide per UPS Express Courier and the shipping-costs are INCLUDED in our sales-price !

All our books are packed safely and securely with professional, stiff cardboard - packaging designed for the protection of rare books.

All our clients are informed about Tracking and due to our cooperation with UPS we can deliver extremely fast and reliable, fully insured to your doorstep.
